alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis; Henderson; Hunt; Kaufman; Navarro; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 9:26PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockwall, southwestern Hunt, Kaufman, western Henderson, central Ellis, eastern Dallas and Navarro Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 926 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rockwall to 7 miles east of Palmer to near Dawson. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Garland, Mesquite, Richardson, Rowlett, Wylie, Rockwall, Lancaster, Corsicana, Balch Springs, Sachse, Ennis, Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Kaufman, Gun Barrel City, Hutchins, Royse City and Heath. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 473 and 511. Interstate 30 between mile markers 52 and 81. Interstate 45 between mile markers 213 and 275. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and north central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Dallas; Ellis; Henderson; Hunt; Kaufman; Navarro; Rockwall
